Articles.Content:
(note) this looks like it was impossible to get into space and into an orbit around the mun in one piece. However I did. using ORDA (semi cheating device )

This is my newest space station. Enjoy and feel free to tell me what you think.

I would say pretty darn impressive, though I would have been even more impressed if it wasn't done in 1 piece. I always have felt the neat thing about space stations is they tend to be built piece by piece, which gives the impression it took a lot of time and work.

But as I said, it is still impressive and I like how it looks.
